[[Back to Session Recordings](../session_recordings.qmd)]{.aside}

Roundtable discussions and other informal sessions

```{r,echo=F, warning=F, error=F, message=F}
library(tidyverse)
df <- read.csv("FE Recordings Database.csv")
df <- df %>% filter(Type=="Discussion")
df <- df %>% relocate(Date)

df <-  df %>% mutate(Links = paste(ifelse(Slides_Link!=" ",paste("<a href=\"",Slides_Link,"\">Slides</a><br>",sep=''),""),ifelse(Recording_Link!=" ",paste("<a href=\"",Recording_Link,"\">Recording</a>",sep=''), ""),sep=''))


DT::datatable(df %>% select(Date,Topic,Links), options = list(dom='f'), escape = F, rownames = F)
```
